Title: Establishes an interstate compact agreement to phase out corporate giveaways
Summary: Establishes an interstate compact agreement to phase out corporate giveaways which prohibits member states from offering or providing any company-specific tax incentive or company-specific grant to any entity for a corporate headquarters, manufacturing facility, office space or other real estate development located in any other member state as an inducement for the corporate headquarters, manufacturing facility, office space or other real estate development to relocate to the offering member state.
LawCode: Add Art 17 ยง250, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing an interstate compact agreement to phase out corporate giveaways
